works.description: My website is www.stopdrinkingalcohol.com.  It has over 50 copyrighted articles dedicated to helping those who are battling alcoholism. The infringing website has stolen content from my homepage AND added their own Adsense code to make money off of my articles. They should not only be removed from google for a DMCA violation, but they have also violated the Adsense terms of use policy.
